title: I haven’t met Charles Sobhraj and was advised against it too by the then investigating officer Amod Kant: Randeep Hooda
text: I haven’t met Charles Sobhraj and was advised against it too by the then investigating officer Amod Kant: Randeep Hooda Thursday, 22 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) With ‘Main Aur Charles’ releasing this October 30, Randeep Hooda often finds himself answering one question - did you ever have a chance to meet the notorious Charles Sobhraj?
